attributes.visualDNA: A natural, organic design language inspired by botanical gardens and plant life. Features earthy greens, warm neutrals, and soft, flowing forms that evoke the tranquility of nature.

body.sampleText: Explore the diverse world of plants, from delicate ferns to towering trees, each with its own unique story to tell.

caption.sampleText: Photo: Morning dew on monstera leaves

attributes.colorPalette:
Primary: Deep Forest Green (#2d5016) for primary actions and emphasis. 

Secondary: Sage Green (#87a96b) for secondary elements. 

Accent: Terracotta (#c1876b) for highlights and calls-to-action.

Background: Warm Cream (#faf8f3) for a natural, paper-like feel.

Neutrals: Soft grays and warm browns for text and borders.
attributes.contentVoice: Warm, inviting, and educational. Use natural, organic language. Informative yet accessible, like a friendly botanist guide. Encourage exploration and discovery.
attributes.designMindset: Design with nature as your guide. Every element should feel organic yet intentional, like a well-tended garden. Balance traditional botanical illustration aesthetics with modern, clean interfaces.
attributes.motionLanguage: Gentle, organic movements. Ease-in-out timing (0.3-0.5s) like swaying leaves. Subtle fade and scale transitions. Growth-inspired animations: elements unfold like unfurling leaves, expand like blooming flowers.
attributes.technicalSpecs: CSS Grid for natural, flowing layouts. CSS Custom Properties for theming. Smooth transitions with cubic-bezier easing. Mobile-first responsive design. WCAG AA contrast ratios maintained.
attributes.compositionRules: Generous whitespace like breathing room in a garden. Vertical rhythm following natural growth patterns. Content grouped in clusters like plant arrangements.
attributes.qualityStandards: Maintain earthy, natural color harmony. Ensure readability with sufficient contrast. Use consistent rounded corners (8-12px). Keep animations subtle and purposeful. Test in both bright and dim lighting conditions.
attributes.typographySystem:
Heading: Playfair Display - elegant serif that evokes classic botanical illustrations. 

Body: Inter - clean, readable sans-serif for modern clarity. 

The combination creates a balance between traditional natural beauty and contemporary usability.
attributes.geometricLanguage: Soft, organic shapes with rounded corners (8-12px radius). Flowing, natural curves rather than sharp angles. Asymmetric layouts that feel balanced like natural growth patterns.
attributes.materialVocabulary: Subtle textures suggesting natural materials: soft paper grain, linen weaves. Gentle shadows that mimic dappled sunlight (0.5-2px). Matte finishes with occasional soft glosses like morning dew.
attributes.componentVocabulary:
Buttons: Rounded with subtle depth, like smooth river stones. 

Cards: Soft shadows, cream backgrounds, subtle borders. 

Inputs: Natural borders with gentle focus states (green glow). 

Tags/Pills: Rounded, using sage and terracotta colors.
attributes.applicationScenarios: Perfect for: Nature/gardening apps, wellness platforms, sustainable brands, educational content, eco-friendly e-commerce, botanical databases, outdoor recreation apps.
